item.title: US-54 North at TX-601 Spur
item.description: US-54 north at TX-601 Spur onramp. There is a freeway to freeway connection between US-54 and TX-601, but the author took the ramp from US-54 to a surface street which turns into TX-601.

item.title: I-10 East - I-110/US-54 Jct.
item.description: I-10 east at I-110/US-54 ramps. Use left lane for US-54 East/Alamogordo/Ft. Bliss; use right lane for (I-110 South/US-54 West)Juarez Mexico. Notice that firearms are prohibited in Mexico.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 22B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22B - US-54/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo (NM)/Fort Bliss/Juarez (Mexico). Continue east on I-10 for San Antonio and Van Horn.

item.title: I-10 East - Exits 22A and 22B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22A - TX-478 Loop/Copia St. Approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Alamogordo (NM)/Fort Bliss/Juarez (Mexico). Continue east on I-10 for San Antonio and Van Horn.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South at Split
item.description: US-70 West/US-54 South at US-70/US-54 split.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South at US-70 West
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West (Relief Route) at US-70 West exit to Las Cruces.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West - US-70/US-54 Split
item.description: US-70/US-54 Split on US-70 West/US-54 South (Alamogordo Relief Route). Use left lanes for US-54 south to El Paso.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South - Relief Route
item.description: US-70 West/US-54 South - Alamogordo Relief Route.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West at US-82 and Relief Route
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West at US-82 and Alamogordo Relief Route. Turn left for US-82 east to Cloudcroft. Turn right to continue on US-54 South/US-70 West to Las Cruces and El Paso (Alamogordo Relief Route). Continue straight for White Sands Blvd. and downtown Alamogordo. This is the western end of US-82.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West Approaching US-82
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West approaching US-82 and Alamogordo Relief Route junction.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West - NM-545 Jct.
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West at NM-545 to La Luz.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-70 West/US-54 South in Tularosa. Distance to Alamogordo, Las Cruces, and El Paso.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching US-54
item.description: US-70 west approaching US-54 in Tularosa. US-70 joins US-54 south to Alamogordo.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching US-54
item.description: US-70 west approaching US-54 junction in Tularosa. Merge to continue on US-54/US-70; merge right for US-54 north.

item.title: US-54 North at US-380
item.description: US-54 north at US-380. Turn right for US-380 east to Capitan; left for US-380 west to San Antonio. Continue north for US-54 to Vaughn.

item.title: US-54 North Approaching US-380
item.description: US-54 north approaching US-380 in Carrizozo. Turn left for Valley of Fires State Recreation Area.

item.title: US-380 East at US-54
item.description: US-380 east at US-54 junction in Carrizozo.

item.title: US-380 East at US-54
item.description: US-380 east at US-54. Turn right on US-54 south to Tularosa; turn left on US-54 north to Vaughn. Continue straight on US-380 east for Capitan.

item.title: US-380 East Approaching US-54
item.description: US-380 east approaching US-54 in Carrizozo.

item.title: US-380 East Approaching US-54
item.description: US-380 east approaching US-54 in Carrizozo.

item.title: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82
item.description: White Sands Blvd. north at US-54/US-70/US-82 junction. Turn right for US-82 east; left for US-54 South/US-70 West; straight for US-54 North/US-70 East.

item.title: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82
item.description: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82 in Alamogordo. Turn left for US-54 South/US-70 West/Relief Route/Las Cruces/El Paso. Turn right for US-82/Cloudcroft. Continue straight for US-54 North/US-70 East/Tularosa. This is the northern end of the Alamogordo Relief Route. This is also the western terminus of US-82.

item.title: US-70 East at Alamogordo Relief Route
item.description: US-70 east at Alamogordo Relief Route. Exit here for US-70 East/US-54 North/Relief Route/Tularosa. Continue straight for downtown Alamogordo via White Sands Blvd. White Sands Blvd. rejoins US-54/US-70 on the north end of Alamogordo.

item.title: US-54 North at US-70
item.description: US-54 north at US-70 west, the southern end of the Alamogordo Relief Route. Turn right for US-54 North/US-70 East/Relief Route/Tularosa. Continue north for US-70 west, and downtown Alamogordo.

item.title: US-54 North at US-70 - Alamogordo Relief Route
item.description: US-54 north at US-70. Turn right to access US-82/Cloudcroft (via Alamogordo Relief Route).

item.title: US-54 North Approaching US-70
item.description: US-54 north approaching US-70 at the southern end of the Alamogordo Relief Route.

item.title: US-54 North Approaching US-70
item.description: US-54 north approaching US-70 in Alamogordo. Use US-70 west for Las Cruces. Use US-54 north for Alamogordo and Tularosa. US-70 joins US-54 north to Tularosa.

item.title: US-54 North - Inspection Station
item.description: Approaching Border Patrol Inspection Station on US-54 north. All roads leading out of the El Paso area have Border Patrol Inspections that you must pass through.

item.title: US-54 North - New Mexico Weigh Station
item.description: Approaching New Mexico Weigh Station and Border Patrol Checkpoint.

item.title: US-54 North - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - Land of Enchantment on US-54 north. US-54 is a divided highway from the Texas line north to Tularosa.

item.title: US-54 North at State Line Road
item.description: US-54 north at State Line Road west to Chaparral (New Mexico). Continue north on US-54 for Alamogordo (New Mexico). The highway crosses into New Mexico just north of this junction.

item.title: US-54 North at FM-2529
item.description: US-54 north at FM-2529/McCombs St. Turn left on FM-2529 for Chaparral (New Mexico). Continue north on US-54 for Alamogordo (New Mexico).

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 32
item.description: US-54 north at Exit 32 - Sean Haggerty Drive. All traffic must exit the freeway here. The remainder of US-54 north into New Mexico is a divided expressway.

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 31
item.description: US-54 north at Exit 31 - FM-3255/MLK Jr. Blvd./Kenworthy St. Approaching Sean Haggerty Drive exit. The Patriot Freeway ends at Sean Haggerty Drive exit.

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 29
item.description: US-54 north at Exit 29 - TX-375 Loop North/Woodrow Bean Transmountain Drive. This is the northern end of the TX-375 Loop around El Paso. Approaching Sun Valley Drive, FM-3255/MLK Jr. Blvd./Kenworthy St./Sean Haggerty Drive interchanges.

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 26
item.description: US-54 north at Exit 26 - Business US-54/Dyer St./Hercules Ave. Approaching Hondo Pass Road, Diana Drive, and TX-375 Loop/Trans Mountain Woodrow Bean Drive.

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 24B
item.description: US-54 north approaching Exit 24B - TX-601 Spur East. Use TX-601 Spur for the El Paso International Airport.

item.title: I-10 West at I-110/US-54 Ramps
item.description: I-10 west at I-110/US-54 ramps. Merge right for US-54 North/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo/Fort Bliss. Merge left for (I-110/US-54 South)/Juárez, Mexico. Also use I-110/US-54 south for Chamizal Coliseum. Notice the sign above the Juárez, Mexico signs that shows firearms are not allowed in Mexico.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 22B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 22B - US-54/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo/Fort Bliss/Juárez. I-10 continues west to Las Cruces (New Mexico).

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 23A and 22B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 23A - Raynolds St. Approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo/Fort Bliss/Juárez (Mexico). Also approaching Copia St., and Piedras St./Cotton St interchanges.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 23B, 23A, and 22B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 23B - US-62/US-180/Paisano Dr/Chelsea St. Approaching Exit 23A - Raynolds St. Also approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Alamogordo/Juárez, Mexico/Fort Bliss.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 23A and 22B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 23A - Raynolds St. Approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo (NM)/Fort Bliss/Juarez (Mexico). Continue west on I-10 for Copia St./TX 478 Loop/Piedras St./Cotton St.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 23B, 23A, and 22B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 23B - US-62/US-180/Paisano Drive/Chelsea St. Approaching Exit 23A - Raynolds St. Also approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Alamogordo/Fort Bliss/Juarez, Mexico.

item.title: I-110/US-54 North at I-10
item.description: I-110/US-54 North at I-10/US-180 jct. Merge left for US-54 North/Alamogordo (NM), and I-10/US-180 West/Downtown/Las Cruces (NM). Merge right for I-10(not-signed)/US-180 East/Van Horn/San Antonio. This is the northern end of I-110.
